display_title_en: After meddling with Cool-san who moved in next door, a semi-cohabitation life started with her, who actually wants to be spoiled
display_title_romanji: Tonari ni Koskitekita Cool-san no Sewa wo Yaitara, Jitsu wa Amaetagari Kanojo to Amaama na Handousei Seikatsu ga Hajimatta
title_dump: 隣に越してきたクールさんの世話を焼いたら、実は甘えたがりな彼女との甘々な半同棲生活が始まった
